Name: Batch Panorama Converter
About the game: What tool 'Batch Panorama Converter' is? Batch Panorama Converter can convert normal images into 360 degree panorama in batch! How to use this tool? Step1: Select folder including normal JPG, JPEG or PNG images. Step2: The tool will automatically load all JPG. JPEG and PNG images and convert them into cubemap. Step3: After images to cubemaps conversion is done. You can click the 'start' button, all cubemaps would be converted into 360 degree panoramas then.
